code:
function getItem(key){try{var value=localStorage.getItem(key);if(value){return JSON.parse(value);}return null;}catch(err){console.log(err);}}function setItem(key,value){var val=JSON.stringify(value);try{return localStorage.setItem(key,val);}catch(err){console.log(err);}}function removeItem(key){try{return localStorage.removeItem(key);}catch(err){console.log(err);}}function clearAll(){try{// to prevent this value from getting cleared on logout
var firstLogin=localStorage.getItem('firstLogin');localStorage.clear();if(firstLogin){localStorage.setItem('firstLogin',firstLogin);}}catch(err){console.log(err);}}export default{getItem:getItem,setItem:setItem,removeItem:removeItem,clearAll:clearAll};
